businessPlan.title: AfricaLogi Business Plan
businessPlan.subtitle: Strategic roadmap for transforming Africa's logistics landscape with Swiss-Moroccan operational excellence

executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.concept: Next-generation B2B digital platform serving the African Union
executiveSummary.mission: Simplify, unify, and bring transparency to logistics and trade flows between member nations
executiveSummary.problem: Intra-African trade hampered by fragmented logistics infrastructure and lack of real-time visibility
executiveSummary.solution: Centralized SaaS platform with real-time tracking, digital customs, and carrier network
executiveSummary.advantage: Swiss operational excellence with Moroccan cost competitiveness
executiveSummary.funding: Seed funding required for 18-month operational runway

companyDescription.title: Company Description
companyDescription.mission: To become the operating system for logistics in Africa
companyDescription.vision: An African continent where goods flow as freely as information
companyDescription.strategy: Leveraging Swiss credibility with Moroccan cost efficiency

b2b.title: B2B Enterprise Solutions
b2b.description: Premium logistics management for large-scale operations

saas.description: Tiered subscription model with transaction fees

marketplace.description: Revenue from connecting shippers with carriers

phase2.description: Scale to 15 countries with advanced features and AI integration

phase3.title: Phase 3: Pan-African (Year 3)
phase3.description: Complete African Union coverage with full ecosystem services
